message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on this valuable item. I'm willing to sell it to you for $110.
Thanks for the offer, Alice! I'm interested but $110 is a bit steep for me.  I'm willing to pay $105.  Let's see if we can find common ground.
Thanks for the counteroffer, Bob! I understand that $110 is a bit high for you. I'm willing to compromise and meet you in the middle. I'll sell the product to you for $107.50.
